title: Jim Gaffigan
description:
This week Kevin is joined by comedian and actor Jim Gaffigan. The two discuss where Jim gets his inspiration, the fraternal bond that all comedians share, why Jerry Seinfeld told him he was jealous of his life, and the jokes that he thinks comedians laugh at most when they get off stage.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (kevin hart, jim gaffigan)
